toc: Choosing the Right Database Engine for Your WordPress Site Understanding Database Fundamentals MySQL: The Classic WordPress Database Key Characteristics of MySQL MySQL Strengths for WordPress 1. Battle-tested reliability 2. Excellent performance for typical WordPress workloads 3. Universal WordPress compatibility 4. Comprehensive scaling options MySQL Limitations for WordPress MariaDB: The Enhanced MySQL Alternative Key Characteristics of MariaDB MariaDB Strengths for WordPress 1. Drop-in MySQL replacement with enhancements 2. Advanced security features 3. Better performance under high concurrency 4. Active open-source development MariaDB Limitations for WordPress SQLite: The Lightweight Challenger Key Characteristics of SQLite SQLite Strengths for WordPress 1. Dramatically simplified deployment 2. Exceptional portability 3. Reduced resource requirements 4.
